name: Crafted_Discouraging_Words_C
display_help: Enhances the to hit debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHit.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_display_names: Discouraging Words: To Hit Debuff/Recharge/Endurance Reduction
